_comment: Default early-stage filter for JournalTX. Designed to detect liquidity ignition on new Solana meme tokens while silently excluding late, popular, or maintenance activity.
name: Default Early-Stage Filters
description: Strict early-stage filters focused on liquidity ignition, not popularity
_comment_max_market_cap: Soft defensive ceiling. Tokens above ~$8M market cap are usually no longer early and are likely already crowded.
_comment_max_pair_age_hours: Hard upper limit for early-stage detection. Pairs older than 24h are considered late and ignored.
_comment_preferred_pair_age_hours: Freshness preference. Pairs under 6h old are prioritized as true early-stage opportunities.
_comment_signal_window_minutes: Time window in which multiple signals must occur to confirm real momentum instead of isolated events.

hard_reject_if._comment_pair_age_hours_gt: Absolute rejection rule. If pair age exceeds 24h, the token is no longer early and must not alert.
hard_reject_if._comment_market_cap_usd_gte: Hard exclusion for large tokens. >=$20M market cap indicates late-stage or already-distributed assets.
hard_reject_if._comment_baseline_liquidity_sol_gt: Rejects pools that already had significant liquidity before the event. Prevents maintenance LP or rotation from triggering alerts.

_comment_legacy_memes: Explicit blacklist of well-known or legacy memes. These assets are not early-stage and should never trigger discovery alerts.
